author: Simon Difford
description: Peachier in colour than black but balanced and tasty. Not sweet.
name: Black Magic
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
105 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker
Add liqueur, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
